name: English Rose
description: This rose really smells like an English rose garden. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Sandalwood
description: A sensuous, woodsy, soft and sweet sandalwood that smells simply amazing. We’ve put veins of copper mica in this soap to enhance that summer tan. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Cafe Mocha
description: The scent of rich chocolate and stimulating coffee (and yes, we even threw in the grounds for exfoliation.) Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Patchouli & Sandalwood
description: The rich, earthy scents of patchouli and sandalwood tantalize your senses with this 70’s hippy throwback. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Southern Peach
description: This isn’t your traditional peach; it’s softer, more rounded with some white floral notes and tropical notes like guava, mango and ripe papaya thrown in to make it a complex, sweet peachy scent. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Orange & Grapefruit
description: The scent of a sweet juicy orange with the zest of the peel and a fresh grapefruit whirled up in a blender. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Eden's Garden
description: White florals – Lily, Gardenia, and Narcissus with notes of orange and lemon and a soft hint of green. A delicate scent. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Patchouli & Musk
description: Truly a scent for the hippy in all of us.  Musky, smoky and deep, this fragrance will take you back to the 70’s. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Energy
description: A stimulating blend of Citrus, including Grapefruit, Lemon and Lime, with hints of fresh Cucumber and Jasmine, and a touch of Pineapple, Blackberry and Champagne. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Fresh Bamboo
description: The clean scent reminds us of crisp jungle leaves in a damp rainforest. Imagine the smell of wild Bamboo stalks, crisp Aloe and Jasmine Petals with base notes of Vetivert and soft musk mixed together in a refreshing soap. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Beach Breezes
description: This complex, sophisticated fragrance is actually a light Ocean-type scent. It has top notes of Bergamot and Cyclamen (a flower with a "white" scent), light Melon and Cantaloupe, with notes of Lilac, Jasmine and Lily of the Valley, Cedarwood, Sandalwood and Musk. All this together become the perfect unisex and breezy Ocean scent. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Fresh Linen
description: A sunny fragrance. Crisp and clean – like sheets dried on the clothes line. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Relaxing
description: A relaxing blend of French Lavender and Fir Pine, enhanced with Egyptian Jasmine and sweetened with pure Vanilla, softened with delicate Musks. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Bay Rum
description: A men’s favorite.  This fragrance is all about exotic spices - Allspice, Capers, Cloves, Nutmeg and mix with Crushed Orange, Crisp Pine Needles and just a touch of Patchouli and Vanilla to add a deep base note for staying powder. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Wakeup Rosemary
description: Fresh enough to wake you up early in the morning. Freshly picked rosemary springs are aromatically blended with the perfect touch of garden herbs. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Spearmint & Eucalyptus
description: Invigorating eucalyptus and garden spearmint are brought together by lavender, citrus, and a touch of calendula for a very energizing fragrance. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: White Tea & Ginger
description: This oriental scent is a blend of citrus notes, exotic spice and beautiful jasmine. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Orange Cranberry
description: Freshly squeezed oranges kissed with tart cranberry. A clean, crisp blend that is sure to awaken the senses. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Tropical Vacation
description: The scent of exotic, juicy pineapple with coconut, freshly squeezed orange and lime. A tropical vacation in your shower! Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Caribbean Coconut
description: The smell of the caribbean with a twist of coconut milk and cool vanilla.  The perfect summer escape – even when you can’t get away. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Pineapple & Mango
description: The smell of Sweet Pineapple, Luscious Mango, Lotus, and Warm Vanilla. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Mango & Coconut
description: This magnificent island aroma bursts with scents of fresh mango and coconut shavings. Sweet sugared musk completes this tropical paradise. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Tangerine & Patchouli
description: The fresh, bright, and fruity scent of tangerine and woody aroma of pungent patchouli with calendula petals will transform your shower into sweet serenity. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Dragon's Blood
description: This mysterious, alluring blend is difficult to describe. With warming notes of amber, incense, Madagascar vanilla and patchouli, Dragon's Blood has layers of romantic notes such as rose, jasmine and lilac. Finally, the sensual, deep blend is topped off with the colorful, light touches of blood orange and grapefruit.  We've added veins of gold mica to enhance your summer tan.  Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Almond Biscotti w/Loofa
description: With a mixture of toasted almonds, sweet cake flour and drizzled chocolate, this fragrance will have you drooling and wanting to eat pastries! We've added shredded loofa to exfoliate your skin at the same time you cleanse with this luxurious soap. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Peppermint and Pink Sea Salt
description: Refreshing Peppermint with Pink Himalayan Salt, hand-mined from ancient salt beds within the Himalayan Mountains. Protected from pollution and impurities since their formation 200 million years ago, Pink Himalayan salt is believed to be the purest form of salt available. This salt is known for its stimulating and soothing properties.  Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Cranberry Fig
description: An excellent compromise between the tart bit or Cranberries and the sweet, mild allure of Fig with those added notes of Blood Orange and Pink Grapefruit in the mix. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Lavender, Vanilla and Baby Powder
description: It’s the true aroma of lavender, vanilla and baby powder with lavender buds for exfoliation! Clean, fresh, and calming. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Jasmine
description: The alluring scent of beautiful and mysterious jasmine flower. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Honeysuckle
description: A beautifully enticing spring aroma of golden honeysuckle nectar.  Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Cedar and Saffron
description: Fragrant cedar is infused with the sensual smoky scents of patchouli, sandalwood and vetiver, then topped with Eastern spices and a trace of white musk. Contains veins of gold mica which enhances your summer tan. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Cucumber Melon
description: - Fresh, watery summer honeydew and sweet watermelon combined with crisp, cool cucumber. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Gain
description: Fresh water accords pervade the top as beautiful, floral notes come to full bloom. The clean scents of ozone and soft sandalwood enhance this clean fragrance. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: All Natural w/Apricot Seed Powder
description: All natural with finely ground apricot seeds considered a “skin friendly” scrub that is unlikely to cause damage. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Rosemary Mint
description: A revitalizing blend of rosemary, fresh garden herbs and mint. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Fireside
description: A warming blend of cedarwood, sandalwood and leather with rich amber and cashmere musk. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Teenage Dream
description: With Dead Sea Clay, Fullers Earth Clay, and Lemon Peel Powder.  The ingredients are thought to remove acne causing toxins from the skin, revitalize tired skin, absorb oil, and tighten the pores, thus improving skin texture with a smooth, soft and glowing appearance.  Scented with the warmth of Patchouli, Cedarwood, Sandalwood, and Musk. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Dulce Caramello
description: The irresistible scent of dulce de leche blended artfully with creamy caramel. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Fresh Cut Grass
description: The wonderful fresh aroma of freshly cut green grass. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Lemon Verbena
description: A fresh, crisp scent of lemon verbena is delightfully blended with the zesty layers of a citrus complex, including juicy hints of grapefruit and orange. Tantalizingly tart! Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Cinnamon Stick
description: A full bodied scent of rich spicy cinnamon. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Peppermint Stick
description: Bright and refreshing peppermint blended with sweet sugar crystals. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Santa's Pipe
description: A cozy scent with notes of cherrywood, raspberry, vanilla and tobacco. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Snickerdoodle Cookies
description: Delicious concoction of cinnamon, butter, sugar cookie and allspice. Net wt. 4.5 oz. For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Santa's Tree Farm
description: It's the aroma of freshly cut evergreen branches. Reminiscent of a refreshing walk through a tree farm as your family prepares to cut down their season tree on a cool winter day. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: White Christmas
description: A crisp outdoor blend of pine, fir needles, cedar bark and eucalyptus. Net wt. 4.5 oz.  For ingredients please see our soap ingredients page.

name: Vanilla Sugar Scrub
description: Just what you need to remove dead skin cells and nourish the new skin, with a comforting blend of nutty almond with warm vanilla and cinnamon notes. It nourishes and cleanses your skin while you exfoliate. The glycerin in this scrub acts as a moisture barrier, blocking and sealing in moisture. Net weight 6oz.  For ingredients please see our sugar scrub ingredients page.

name: Peppermint Sugar Scrub
description: Just what you need to remove dead skin cells and nourish the new skin, with a refreshing scent of peppermint. It nourishes and cleanses your skin while you exfoliate. The glycerin in this scrub acts as a moisture barrier, blocking and sealing in moisture. Net weight 6oz.  For ingredients please see our sugar scrub ingredients page.

name: Sandalwood Sugar Scrub
description: Sandalwood Sugar Scrub - Just what you need to remove dead skin cells and nourish the new skin with the warm exotic scent of Sandalwood. It nourishes and cleanses your skin while you exfoliate.  The glycerin in this scrub acts as a moisture barrier, blocking and sealing in moisture. Net wt. 6 oz. name: Rosemary Mint Sugar Scrub

It nourishes and cleanses your skin while you exfoliate.  The glycerin in this scrub acts as a moisture barrier, blocking and sealing in moisture. Net wt. 6 oz. description: White Tea and Ginger Sugar Scrub - Just what you need to remove dead skin cells and nourish the new skin with a refreshing scent of White Tea and Ginger. It nourishes and cleanses your skin while you exfoliate.  The glycerin in this scrub acts as a moisture barrier, blocking and sealing in moisture. Net wt. 6 oz. For ingredients please see our sugar scrub ingredients page.

name: Lavender Sugar Scrub
description: Lavender Sugar Scrub - Just what you need to remove dead skin cells and nourish the new skin with the comforting scent or Lavender and a slight hint of Baby Powder. It nourishes and cleanses your skin while you exfoliate.  The glycerin in this scrub acts as a moisture barrier, blocking and sealing in moisture. Net wt. 6 oz.
